name: Garden Rush (ZirconiumLabs)
description:
You have a garden, you can grow it in a flood-fill way. Your advisor "Pop the farmer" will decide which crop to grow. You have to grow exactly what Pop wants in the garden. Game may not be easy as you think. Take care! 

How to play : Click any square in the garden grid. The color of the square you selected will be the fill color. Good luck !
